text: The men's C-1 500 metres competition at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Szeged took place at the Olympic Centre of Szeged. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Thursday 22 August 2019 || 11:55 || Heats |- | Friday 23 August 2019 || 12:03 || Semifinals |- | rowspan=2|Saturday 24 August 2019 || 09:31 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon|
